name: ZeroENH-Araki
description: Hirohiko Araki's JoJo's Bizarre Adventure visual language as a ZeroENH enhancement profile. Renaissance sculpture meets Italian haute couture meets cinematic theatricality. Enhances prompts with dramatic fashion-forward aesthetics, extreme poses, non-naturalistic color palettes, theatrical composition, and chiaroscuro lighting divorced from realism. Designed to inject Araki's signature dramatic energy into any subject.
